With the intention of establishing a basis and without expecting any reward from you, I have obtained a receipt in my name from the Gram Panchayat Board account and hereby grant me full rights and ownership of the property in the Scheduled Area of the said property.
1,26,000/-characters, I have given you the property valued at one lakh twenty six thousand rupees free of charge and have made it your possession this day. From now on, all the rights and obligations I have on the said Scheduled Area shall belong to you and you shall be your heirs. They should enjoy the property with full rights and privileges. Neither I nor my other heirs have any rights or obligations. I hereby resign and sign the deed of donation of the property.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 339 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Kavali Vannuruswamy in favour of his Wife, Kavali Jyothi towards the property admeasuring an extent of 49.21 Sq. Yds., bearing South side house number 1/126, Assessment Number 308(Old), 196707000476(New), comprised in survey number 130, situated in Pandikunta Village and Grama Panchayath, Vajrakaruru Mandal, within the District of Anantapur, registered at sub-registrar office Uravakonda(1218), is bounded as follows: Schedule 1 - Boundaries as per the Deed North by: Remaining Open Site of Donor South by: Rastha East by: House of Ramaiah West by: Remaining Open Site of Donor
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible. 2.It is to be noted that there is mismatch with the House Number between Schedule(1/126) and Annexure-1A(308), it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain updated EC as per Deed.
